title: League Open Beta Client
body:
I need help.
A few days ago I deleted every program on my computer.(Windows 10)
Then I downloaded the League Client and started it. It asked if I wanted to update to the open beta, and I said yes.
But a few moments later, it asked me to reinstall the League client again.{{item:3151}} 
I tried lots of times. But it looks like I can't play on Open Beta. 
How can I fix this???(Currently playing on the Legacy Client)

replies.body:
If you received the "Please reinstall the Alpha Client" error, it means that something went wrong during the upgrade. Your two options of bypassing this to use to Beta Client are listed below:

1. Delete the **LeagueClient.exe** file from inside your installation directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends), then launch the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file and complete the upgrade again.

2. If step 1 didn't work for you, you'll have to complete a clean reinstallation of League using [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends). Once the reinstallation goes through, try the Beta upgrade again.

Let me know which step ended up working out for you!

i had the same problem but we have  to go through the entire upgrade again targons? cause i deleted leagueclient.exe and launched admin one and it started upgrading again at 0%. hope it doesnt take long thank god its not a 1/2 part thing

targons blade can u quickly check out my post here 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MhtUFzmi-why-is-teemo-disabled
Thanks Targons Blade! It worked for me as well. Also very fast feedback! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
